title: Discover Merchants and Offers
desc: On our homepage, you can effortlessly explore enticing discounts, loyalty programs, and detailed merchant information. Additionally, you have the freedom to add items to your virtual shopping cart.

title: Map and Geo-fencing Notifications
desc: You can pull up from the homepage to access an extensive map for nearby merchants and offers. Enable notifications, and ShopX will alert you to discounts and loyalty programs within a one-mile radius, ensuring you never miss valuable deals.

title: Immersive AR Experience
desc: ShopX also offers immersive AR experiences, allowing you to visualize products realistically, enhancing your understanding, and helping you make informed shopping decisions.

title: Enroll in Loyalty Programs and Place Orders
desc: We enable you to easily access merchant loyalty programs, enroll, and accumulate loyalty points. Placing and paying for orders is a one-click process, simplifying the entire transaction.

title: Social Sharing
desc: Guess what? After placing orders, ShopX lets you share shopping experiences with AR filters on Instagram and Facebook, recommending favorite merchants and items, and spreading remarkable offers.
